name: Markdown File Reader
description: Reads the content of a markdown file from a given file path and returns the full markdown content or an explanation if an error occurs.
author: @@official.shinkai

md_file_path.description: The path to the markdown file to read

error_message.description: An error message if the file could not be read

file_path.description: The path of the markdown file that was read

full_markdown_content.description: The full content of the markdown file
